record.id: field.name="track.receiving" and file.name="model" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: track.receiving
record.file.name: model

brief.brief: If selected (set to true), indicates that the receiving process should occur for this part.
When this option is true, Service Manager tracks the arrival of the ordered line item for this component and records information in the receiving log.
If cleared (set to false), Service Manager closes the line item but does not run the receiving process.

detail.detail: You do not need to serialize a part in order to receive it. The receiving field is independent from the Serialized field. This enables you to receive items without being limited to particular configuration rules.
